Ask HN: Anxiety and dread approaching status update meetings
text:
If my role is primarily maintaining a large complex legacy application where you're solving scaling issues, there might not be a measurable outcome to report like delivered that feature etc. How am I supposed to give my updates without freaking out that I will be seen to have done nothing (ie solved the problem).

Secondly, if doing R&D, how do you update that you did a thing when it's not anything of note.

Microsoft Designer: AI Prompt Design Principles
Write assembly that opens each file in a dir and changes foo with bar
text:
Write an assembly program that opens each file in a directory and then changes all of the occurences of foo with bar.

;Open a file handle

mov ax, 3Dh

mov dx, offset filename

int 21h

;Check that the file handle is valid

cmp ax, 0

jne file_open

;Start looping through the directory

mov si, offset directory

mov di, offset filename

loop:

mov al, [si]

cmp al, 0

je exit

;Copy the filename

mov [di], al

inc si

inc di

jmp loop

file_open:

;Read the file and search for "foo"

mov bx, ax

mov ah, 3Fh

mov cx, 0FFFFh

mov dx, offset buffer

int 21h

;Check if the end of file has been reached

cmp ax, 0

je exit

;Loop through the read buffer

mov si, offset buffer

mov di, offset replace

loop2: mov al, [si] cmp al, 'f' je check_foo inc si jmp loop2

check_foo: cmp byte [si + 1], 'o' jne loop2 cmp byte [si + 2], 'o' jne loop2

;Replace "foo" with "bar" mov [di], 'b' inc di mov [di], 'a' inc di mov [di], 'r' inc di jmp loop2

;Write the modified buffer to the file mov bx, ax mov ah, 40h mov cx, 0FFFFh mov dx, offset replace int 21h

;Go to the next file jmp file_open

exit: ;Close the file mov ah, 3Eh int 21h

;Exit mov ax, 4C00h int 21h

Ask HN: Does sharing photos back and forth after an event bothers you?
text:
Hey,

It usually happens that when we get back from a party or event, we are asked to share the images & videos captured by us with everyone in the group. Sometimes, it gets frustrating.

To tackle this problem, I'm developing an app. It is called Comcam. Comcam, short for the common camera, is a camera app that removes the need of sharing images & videos back & forth by saving them at a common location that anyone with access to it can access. Just capture the moments & forget about sharing them with others.

Comcam would be launching on Product Hunt on Jan 10. Make sure to turn on the notification here: https://www.producthunt.com/products/comcam

Let me know your thoughts & feedback on the idea.

Ask HN: Why doesn't an iPhone with no cellular data open WiFi captive portal
text: Recently had some family visiting from overseas. Some didn’t have roaming data, and it seemed that their phones would sometimes just never open captive portal pages to log in when connecting to free wifi places. Now I’m having same problem after my carrier blocked my data because my payment card expired. Even when I’m connected to wifi, and expecting a pop up from the os, or a browser redirect if I go to http page, to the Wi-Fi login pages, nothing loads. Does iOS have to try making a connection on the wwan before trying wan, and the wwan is sending my packets into a ‘no packet gateway bearer for you’ black hole, in a way that doesn’t time out, so iOS never tries wan to get the redirect? Anyone know what’s happening and how I could work around it. Authenticated Wi-Fi works fine.
